name: Horse, Draft
description: The Draft Horse is a large beast known for its strength and capacity to transport goods or riders.
memorable: Its exceptional ability to carry heavy loads makes it invaluable for logistical tasks.
goals: Primarily used for transportation and heavy lifting.
relations: Related to other draft animals and can be encountered alongside pack animals.
environment: Typically found in stables, farms, or as part of a caravan.
strengths: Notable strength allows it to push, drag, or lift very heavy weights.
weaknesses: Low mental capabilities and vulnerabilities in combat due to low AC.
attacks: Uses its Hooves for melee attacks, dealing decent bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Draft Animal ability to push, drag, or lift three times its carrying capacity.
senses: Possesses average perception with a score of 12, allowing it to notice things competently.
skills: Not skilled in stealth, with a low score of 10.
additional_information: Typically utilized in transportation and logistics.
Vulnerable in combat due to poor defenses.
Its physical prowess makes it a solid choice for labor-intensive tasks.
test_queries: strong animal for carrying heavy loads
draft animal with good lifting capacity
